Section¶

Model class that handles Section objects.

class home.models.section.Section(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class to define Section objects.

profile¶

Related home.models.profile.Profile object.

name¶

Name of Section object for reference.

content¶

JSON encoded content for the current section.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
classmethod create(name='default', *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class method to handle creation of Section objects for testing.

Parameters:
  • cls (home.models.section.Section) – The Section class.
  • name (str) – Name of the section.
  • content (str) – Content for the section.
Returns:

Reference to the created Section.
